//overview_example: Looking for a software engineer to work on the next generation of Google Search, improving search quality and user experience.
overview: We're seeking a purpose-driven and innovative Creative with a focus on Generative AI. Join our distributed team of creatives specialized in AI and automation, working on various capabilities such as AI-enhanced Branding, Ad and Social creative, illustration, photographic assets, and illustration.
description: We are looking for a Creative with a focus on Generative AI to join our distributed team. As a Creative at Superside, you will generate visually stunning brand concepts and designs using AI tools. You will also utilize generative AI and automation tools to produce large-scale outputs. Your role will involve optimizing and streamlining design workflows, staying up-to-date with design trends, collaborating with teams, managing multiple projects, and actively problem-solving. You will have a solid understanding of Dynamic Creative Optimization, Real-Time Marketing tools, and Automation platforms. Proficiency in using AI tools and excellent presentation and design skills are essential. Strong communication skills, a bias for action, and experience managing creative projects are also required.
requirements: BA or higher in Design, Creative, or similar fields
2-4 years of experience in a creative design role
Passion for generative AI and programmatic creation
Proficiency in using AI tools to augment design processes
Experience in implementing and managing generative AI systems in a creative context
Strong portfolio of Branding, Digital Ads, Creative Concepts, and Design
Solid understanding of Dynamic Creative Optimization, Real-Time Marketing tools, and Automation platforms such as Bannerflow, Storyteq, Celtra, Smartly
Excellent presentation and design skills using the Adobe Creative Suite, PowerPoint, Figma
Ability to quickly learn processes and multi-task projects with great detail
Excellent English verbal and written communication skills
Bias for action, proactive, customer-centric, and execution-driven mindset
Experience managing creative projects in their entirety
